practiceAreas: Personal Injury|Trucking Accidents|Motorcycle Accidents|Car Accidents|Bicycle Accidents|Burn Accidents|Wrongful Death|Slip and Fall
description:
Our team at Legal Defenders has returned hundreds of millions of dollars to victims of negligence in Beverly Hills and throughout the Los Angeles, California, area. We focus exclusively on personal injury cases, which means all of our resources are poured into making sure you get the best possible legal representation. The attorneys at our law firm, who have more than 90 years of experience, excel in negotiations as well as in litigation.

Since we opened our law firm more than two decades ago, we have handled more than 10,000 cases involving matters such as the following:
• Car, truck and motorcycle accidents
• Uber accidents
• Brain and spinal injuries
• Slip-and-fall accidents
• Wrongful death
Our success rate is more than 99%. That is because of the personalized attention we give each client. When you work with us, you can rest assured that you have experience and commitment on your side.
At Legal Defenders, we do everything we can to ease your mind during this time. We offer free initial consultations and can meet with clients virtually or in a place convenient to them. Additionally, we work on a contingency fee basis, which means we only collect from you if we win your case. Our law firm has four locations and accepts credit cards.
